document_data.name: Broadleaf Manor
document_data.mainbody: '''Broadleaf Manor''' was the expansive mansion of the famed adventurer, [[Elvira Broadleaf]], located in the [[Temple District (Ravens Bluff)|Temple District]] of [[Ravens Bluff]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was located on [[Rhabie Promenade]] in the [[Swordspoint]] neighborhood, a short ways away from the [[Fiddlers' Green]] city park.
